name: West Yorkshire DaySaver Train
description:
WEST YORKSHIRE DAYSAVER TRAIN Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for one day between all stations in the West Yorkshire rail network area. It allows travel anywhere in the West Yorkshire rail network area bounded by Steeton & Silsden, Ilkley, Horsforth, Micklefield, Knottingley, Pontefract Baghill, South Elmsall, 
      Moorthorpe, Darton, Denby Dale and Marsden and encompasses the major connurbations of Leeds, Bradford, Huddersfield, Halifax and Wakefield. Formerly known as the West Yorkshire Day Rover.
